content: {A惊叹}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>... it seems you've received a Luca Fruit from a Neighbor. A most joyous gift, indeed!
info: 露卡瓶12-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Thank you for accompanying your Neighbors on their journeys. Their Planettes will, through connections with the universe, gradually grow into something truly unique.
info: 露卡瓶12-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Also, this jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Here you go. Use it to keep watering the Luca Arbor.
info: 露卡瓶12-莫白_主流程文本II
